thread.section_title: Jacada Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jacada Travel | jacadatravel.com
thread.title: Christopher Reeder
thread.title_full: Jacada Travel reviewed by Christopher Reeder

author: Christopher Reeder
title: Christopher Reeder
text: I would recommend not using this company for many reasons. They set up a trip for my wife and myself for a 10 day trip to Patagonia. The screwed up the itinerary and I had to pay for the changes. They also switched us to a hotel that was $1,000 (USD) cheaper and didn't refund the difference. They said that the hotel (EOLO) didn't refund the money . I contacted the hotel and they said that wasn't true. They are not honorable. Stay away!!!
